meanings.definition: Making a soft, whispering or rustling sound.
meanings.sent1: The susurrant wind gently swayed the leaves on the trees.
meanings.sent2: The susurrant stream flowed peacefully through the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The susurrant sound of the pages turning put me to sleep in no time.
meanings.sent4: The susurrant rain outside was like a lullaby, calming my mind.
meanings.sent5: The susurrant rustle of the grass made the field feel alive.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a soft, murmuring or rustling sound.
meanings.sent1: The susurrant leaves danced in the breeze, creating a soothing atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The susurrant forest was a peaceful retreat from the noisy city.
meanings.sent3: The susurrant hum of the refrigerator made it seem like it was whispering secrets.
meanings.sent4: The susurrant fabric of her dress seemed to echo the sound of the wind.
meanings.sent5: The susurrant night enveloped the town in a blanket of tranquility.
